医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阻断 nidogen-2 增强胰腺癌化疗疗效加文医学研究所的研究人员已经确定了胰腺癌的潜在新治疗靶点，胰腺癌是治疗选择有限的最致命的癌症类型之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Blocking-nidogen-2-enhances-chemotherapy-efficacy-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Blocking-nidogen-2-enhances-chemotherapy-efficacy-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3d515dc-24b2-44a9-9a0c-d237e71a7590 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:50:24 -0400 Blocking nidogen-2 enhances chemotherapy efficacy in pancreatic cancer
开发新平台来探测参与代谢的基因的功能一个多学科研究团队开发了一个发现平台来探测参与新陈代谢的基因的功能；所有维持生命的化学反应的总和。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/New-platform-development-to-probe-the-function-of-genes-involved-in-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/New-platform-development-to-probe-the-function-of-genes-involved-in-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a194c3d3-3fbb-40b9-a9cb-38fa942c0ae3 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:38:08 -0400 New platform developed to probe the function of genes involved in metabolism
研究发现患有严重心理健康症状的儿童的寄宿率存在差异由麦克莱恩医院和哈佛医学院的研究人员与马萨诸塞州总医院和剑桥健康联盟的研究人员合作进行的一项新研究发现，急诊科患有严重心理健康症状的儿童和青少年的寄宿率存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Study-uncovers-disparities-in-boarding-rates-of-children-with-severe-mental-health-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Study-uncovers-disparities-in-boarding-rates-of-children-with-severe-mental-health-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6101930c-e2fb-46f5-9ddc-5163c56065ea Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:33:55 -0400 Study uncovers disparities in boarding rates of children with severe mental health symptoms
牛奶可能传播 H5N1 流感，但空气传播有限虽然从受感染的牛奶中提取的 H5N1 禽流感病毒滴入小鼠和雪貂的鼻子后会导致它们生病，但病毒在雪貂之间通过空气传播；人类传播的通用模型 -；似乎是有限的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Cows-milk-may-spread-H5N1-flu-but-airborne-transmission-is-limited.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Cows-milk-may-spread-H5N1-flu-but-airborne-transmission-is-limited.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02a5c42d-5491-40bd-8e6d-6dad91f84cc8 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:29:10 -0400 Cow's milk may spread H5N1 flu, but airborne transmission is limited
都柏林三一学院的研究人员发现了增强 MRSA 疫苗功效的关键都柏林三一学院的研究人员在了解我们如何对抗潜在致命的耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌（MRSA）方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Trinity-College-Dublin-researchers-uncover-key-to-enhancing-MRSA-vaccine-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Trinity-College-Dublin-researchers-uncover-key-to-enhancing-MRSA-vaccine-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4dfbe3c5-4c44-4438-85fc-8516abbfa7ef Tue, 09 Jul 2024 14:23:28 -0400 Trinity College Dublin researchers uncover key to enhancing MRSA vaccine efficacy
了解镰状细胞病患者的痛苦虽然镰状细胞病患者的痛苦已有充分记录，但痛苦的来源以及患者如何处理痛苦尚未得到充分探讨。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Understanding-病人-distress-in-sickle-cell-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Understanding-病人-distress-in-sickle-cell-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=142253ea-a997-4e09-bbbd-048a51ab107a Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:29:34 -0400 Understanding patient distress in sickle cell disease
动物模型揭示了正在研究的脑器官在修复中风损伤中的作用辛辛那提大学的研究人员开创了一种动物模型，揭示了大脑中未被研究的器官在修复中风造成的损伤中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Animal-model-sheds-light-on-the-role-understudied-brain-organ-in-repairing-中风-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Animal-model-sheds-light-on-the-role-understudied-brain-organ-in-repairing-中风-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7a012be-fa6e-46c7-8891-af16381bd92a Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:23:57 -0400 Animal model sheds light on the role understudied brain organ in repairing stroke damage
如果诉讼终止联邦对节育覆盖的授权，各州将拥有发言权大卫·恩格勒非常确定他不想要孩子。两年前的一个令人沮丧的上学日帮助这位现年 43 岁的代课老师达成了协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/If-lawsuit-ends-federal-mandates-on-birth-control-coverage-states-will-have-the-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/If-lawsuit-ends-federal-mandates-on-birth-control-coverage-states-will-have-the-say.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bed03c7-449e-462c-9beb-935ba9ea4111 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:18:53 -0400 If lawsuit ends federal mandates on birth control coverage, states will have the say
共和党的蒂姆·希伊在关键的参议院竞选中重提不可信的堕胎主张“选择性堕胎直至出生那一刻。健康、9个月大的婴儿在出生那一刻就被杀死。这就是乔恩·泰斯特和民主党所投票支持的。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/GOPe28099s-Tim-Sheehy-revives-discredited-abortion-claims-in-pivotal-senate-race.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/GOPe28099s-Tim-Sheehy-revives-discredited-abortion-claims-in-pivotal-senate-race.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19e90355-4152-4718-a135-9f9ec546cd06 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:17:21 -0400 GOP’s Tim Sheehy revives discredited abortion claims in pivotal senate race
从 Dr. Oz 到心脏瓣膜：一款微型设备通过 FDA 绘制了一条有争议的道路2013 年，FDA 批准了一种可植入装置来治疗渗漏的心脏瓣膜。它的发明者之一是穆罕默德·奥兹（Mehmet Oz），他是前电视名人和前美国参议院候选人，被广泛称为“奥兹博士”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/From-Dr-Oz-to-heart-valves-A-tiny-device-charted-a-contentious-path-through-the-FDA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/From-Dr-Oz-to-heart-valves-A-tiny-device-charted-a-contentious-path-through-the-FDA.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c658f40-7819-4bca-bf55-670d2a33c836 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 08:14:58 -0400 From Dr. Oz to heart valves: A tiny device charted a contentious path through the FDA
